data.title: 500 families join Mujahideen in Ghor
data.meta_description: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan(IEA), Исламский Эмират Афганистан, Emirato Islámico de Afganistán, 阿富汗伊斯兰酋长国, Afganistan İslam Emirliği.
data.meta_site_name: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, Исламский Эмират Афганистан.
data.text:
GHOR, Jun. 25 – At around 8:00 am local time early morning hours today, residents of a large area named Zarqan Killi that consist of more than 500 families declare their support with Mujahideen of Islamic Emirate amid a brilliant gathering under the leadership of commander Serwar, handing over 50 Kalashnikov rifles, 2 RPG launcher, 3 PKM machine guns and other equipment to Mujahideen.

The white flag of Islamic Emirate has been raised on the area and the said area completely came under the control of Mujahideen.
